headlines.headline: Stephen A.: LeBron crucial for Lakers to make playoffs run
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith argues that if the Lakers are healthy and rolling offensively, they can make a run in the Western Conference playoffs.

headlines.headline: Will this be LeBron's last All-Star Game?
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst and Iman Shumpert join "Get Up" to discuss whether this could be LeBron James' last NBA All-Star Game.

headlines.headline: NBA All-Star 2026: A timeline of uniform designs
headlines.description: NBA All-Star Game jerseys have had several style changes since the game's inception in 1951. Here are some special designs from each decade.

headlines.headline: Language of basketball: How international NBA players think about the game
headlines.description: For many of today's NBA All-Stars, English is their second language, and that impacts how they think about the game.

headlines.headline: LeBron James becomes oldest with triple-double in NBA history
headlines.description: LeBron James broke a record held by Karl Malone by posting a triple-double in the Lakers' win over the Mavericks.

headlines.headline: Source: Cowboys to hire SMU DC Symons as new ILB coach
headlines.description: The Dallas Cowboys are set to name SMU defensive coordinator Scott Symons as their new inside linebackers coach, a source confirmed to ESPN.

headlines.headline: Patriots' Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault allegation
headlines.description: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs pleaded not guilty to felony strangulation and other criminal charges stemming from an alleged dispute with his personal chef.

headlines.headline: Will Kenneth Walker III still be with the Seahawks next season?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew debates whether the Seahawks should do all they can to keep Super Bowl MVP Kenneth Walker III.

headlines.headline: Is it time for Maxx Crosby and Raiders to part ways?
headlines.description: Dan Graziano, Bart Scott and Mike Tannenbaum discuss the best course of action for Maxx Crosby and the Las Vegas Raiders in the offseason.

headlines.headline: Is Sirianni on the hot seat heading into 6th season with the Eagles?
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum, Dan Graziano and Bart Scott weigh in on the pressure Nick Sirianni faces heading into his sixth season as Eagles head coach.

headlines.headline: Could Jeremiyah Love solve the Chiefs' RB issue?
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum, Dan Graziano and Bart Scott debate whether the Chiefs should draft Jeremiyah Love or look to acquire an established running back in the offseason.

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada men, United States women favored to win Olympic gold

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026 men's hockey: Standings, stats, schedule, more
headlines.description: Plus, Canada and Switzerland square off (3:10 p.m. ET) for early bragging rights atop Group A.

headlines.headline: Inside Macklin Celebrini's rise to stardom for Sharks, Canada
headlines.description: Scoring the opening Olympic goal for his country was the latest milestone on the phenom's meteoric rise.

headlines.headline: Grades, questions from Team USA's Olympic hockey win vs. Latvia

headlines.headline: Grades, questions from Canada's Olympic hockey win vs. Czechia
headlines.description: It was a dominant start for the tournament's gold-medal favorite. Here's how they rolled -- and what's next.
